definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: Alternatively, you may ask the Clerk for an Execution form?
sentences.chinese: 或者，你可以問書記官要一份執行表格。

sentences.english: The clerk assisted the judge by looking up related precedents.
sentences.chinese: 這位書記官協助那位法官查閱有關判例。

sentences.english: The clerk assisted the judge by looking up related precedents. Her breathing was assisted by a respirator.
sentences.chinese: 這位書記官協助那位法官查閱有關判例。

sentences.english: Registry accumulates junk files, and your computer's performance suffers.
sentences.chinese: 書記官處堆積的垃圾文件，計算機的性能受到影響。

sentences.english: The decision of the court runs counter to the advice of the clerk to the justice.
sentences.chinese: 法庭的裁決與法官書記官的意見相悖。

sentences.english: Use this number to identify your case when you contact the Clerk.
sentences.chinese: 在你聯繫書記官時可以用該號碼錶明你的案子。

sentences.english: Every court that I know of in the world has a clerk. In Canada, she’s called the registrar.
sentences.chinese: 就我所知，世界上的每一個最高法院都有一位書記官。

sentences.english: Every magistrates' court has a clerk of the court.
sentences.chinese: 每一個治安法庭配備書記官一名。

sentences.english: The clerk was gabbing over the indictment .
sentences.chinese: 書記官在喃喃誦讀起訴狀。

sentences.english: It is the Clerk's duty to ensure all parties a fair hearing.
sentences.chinese: 書記官的責任就是確保訴訟各方受到公平的審判。

sentences.english: The registry MUST remove the REGISTRY-LOCK status for the registrar to modify the domain.
sentences.chinese: 書記官處必須刪除註冊官的註冊表鎖定狀態來修改域。
